name: CLKComplicationTemplateCircularSmallRingImage
desc: A template for displaying a single image surrounded by a configurable progress ring.

items.name: init(imageProvider: CLKImageProvider, fillFraction: Float, ringStyle: CLKComplicationRingStyle)
items.desc: Creates a new template from the provided image, fill fraction, and ring style.

items.name: var imageProvider: CLKImageProvider
items.desc: The image to display in the complication.

items.name: var ringStyle: CLKComplicationRingStyle
items.desc: The style of the progress ring.

items.name: var fillFraction: Float
items.desc: The fraction of the ring to fill.
